subject: Automobile Racing
Talladega Superspeedway
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch won under a yellow flag, taking the Nationwide race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama when a crash sent Mike Wallace’s car flipping upside down.
snippet: Kyle Busch won under a yellow flag, taking the Nationwide race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama when a crash sent Mike Wallace’s car flipping upside down.
